symbols.name: Position
symbols.what_it_controls: Location of a feature relative to datums
symbols.typical_use: Holes, pins, patterns relative to datum reference frame
do_dont: Do reference a proper datum set
symbols.figure: A hole located relative to datums A|B|C

symbols.name: Flatness
symbols.what_it_controls: Form of a surface independent of datums
do_dont: Do apply to surfaces where straightness isn't sufficient

symbols.name: Profile of a Surface
symbols.what_it_controls: 3D form relative to basic dimensions; can include datums
do_dont: Do use to control form and sometimes orientation/location
Don't pair with redundant form controls
symbols.figure: Uniform boundary around the true surface

symbols.name: Circular Runout
symbols.what_it_controls: Composite of form and orientation for each circular element

symbols.name: Total Runout
symbols.what_it_controls: Composite of all circular runout elements across the full surface
do_dont: Do evaluate across the full length
Don't use when circular runout suffices

symbols.name: Perpendicularity
symbols.what_it_controls: Orientation of a surface or axis at 90°
symbols.figure: Zone of two planes perpendicular to A

symbols.name: Concentricity (legacy)
symbols.what_it_controls: Median points of opposed elements about a datum axis
